TopicTitle: Some form of project.. related to this game

Articles.Content:
Hey,

I've come across some spare time and I'd love to do something useful related to this game. Alexmoon's website is linked in just about every thread after all

I'm not in a position to make a mod (because I've learnt too many damned languages already) so this is where I ask if anyone knows what maths may not be sitting on an automated website yet?
